subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: As the winner of the Masters, Trevor Immelman is the only golfer eligible to win the 2008 Grand Slam. Asked Tuesday if he had considered that possibility, Immelman quickly answered: “No.”
snippet: As the winner of the Masters, Trevor Immelman is the only golfer eligible to win the 2008 Grand Slam. Asked Tuesday if he had considered that possibility, Immelman quickly answered: “No.”
